_header: Behold man and thy thought up lead
_description: The Joys of Heaven — twenty couplets

BLAdd37049.Transcription:
Behald man and þi þoght vp ledeTo heuen with al þi
                    spede
BLAdd37049.Note:
Excerpts from the Pricke of Conscience, lines 9360-63, 9368-77,
                    8648-55, 8678-81, 8686-89.
BLAdd37049.Editions:
Doty,  Brant Lee,
                        ed.  
             “An Edition of British Museum MS Additional 37049: a Religious
                Miscellany.” 
         Diss. Michigan State, 1969: 443-5.
